metadata.Title: CVE-2022-30595 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description:
libImaging/TgaRleDecode.c in Pillow 9.1.0 has a heap buffer overflow in the processing of invalid TGA image files.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2022-30595` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

python3-pil - 9.0.1-1build1
python3-pil.imagetk - 9.0.1-1build1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: pillow package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '9.0.1-1build1').
